data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Xi-Chang, Li, Peng, Wu, Tie-Jun, Yang, Jian (2019): Cobitis xui, a new species of spined loach (Teleostei: Cobitidae) from the Pearl River drainage in southern China. Zootaxa 4604 (1): 161-175, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.1.6|3 occurrences
